backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining a Tool type and providing CRUD-style functions to add, search, filter, and retrieve tools and categories.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping performance, SEO, and caching optimizations to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text list summarizing key purposes and optimizations of frontend components, hooks, styles, and HTML files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining design tokens, light/dark themes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including metadata, SEO tags, canonical link, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and linking to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap containing a single URL entry for the site homepage with metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating tool fetching, filtering, lazy-loaded sections, non-blocking preloading, and JSON-LD injection.
Renders clickable category badges to filter tools based on the selected category.
frontend/src/components/CTASection.tsx: CTA section with a headline and button that scrolls to the top when clicked.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Displays a list of FAQs using an accordion layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides footer navigation links and site attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with site title and a button linking to external coupon offers.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with a headline, subheadline, and achievement badges.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search input with an icon for filtering tools by name or description.
frontend/src/components/SeoJsonLd.tsx: Generates JSON-LD schema for SEO using website, organization, and tools data.
frontend/src/components/ToolCard.tsx: Displays a toolâ€™s logo, name, rating, tags, deal, and a promotional badge in a card layout.
frontend/src/components/ToolModal.tsx: Modal showing tool details with buttons to visit the official site or partner offers.
frontend/src/components/ToolsGrid.tsx: Grid of static tool data rendered as ToolCards with modal interactions.
frontend/src/components/TopBanner.tsx: Top banner linking to external AI deals with promotional text.
frontend/src/components/TrustSection.tsx: Displays a trust section with a header and a grid of company logos loaded from static image paths.
frontend/src/components/WhyUseSection.ts: Renders a three-column feature list, each with an icon, title, and description pulled from a local array.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, searching, and filtering tools and categories through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, dark mode values, and performance optimizations like content-visibility and reduced-motion rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, container settings, animations, and plugins.
Technical checklist documenting SEO, performance, caching, and lazy-loading optimizations while keeping the UI visually unchanged.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, constraints, and feature requirements emphasizing pixel-identical UI and technical-only optimizations.
